Interface ProcessMonitoring

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessMonitoringImpl

    public interface ProcessMonitoring
    Process Monitoring Interface offers services in order to monitor workflows

      • getProcessWorkflowStatus

        StatusCode getProcessWorkflowStatus(String processId,
                                    Integer tenantId)
                             throws ProcessingException
        Return true if at least one of the step status is KO or FATAL.
        Parameters:
        processId - The workflow identifier
        tenantId - Tenant identifier
        Returns:
        true if at least one of the step status is KO or FATAL, else false
        Throws:
        ProcessingException - if the process does not exist
